title: Daughter of the Light
description: A story of Light, Life & Magic. Of a changing world. A story of a young woman's life, the life of the wise, the powerful, the strong and the weak. The story of a playful cat, a wise lammasu, a very clever wizard, a story of love, tears, of loss and victory, learning and knowing.It is the adventure of good versus evil and those who see beyond that apparent reality. First of 5 books in the series.
author: Louise   Andersen
